author: 392hazelf
title: Excellent location, clean and comfortable, would highly recommend. - Review
text: Really enjoyed our stay. Very convenient location, 5 minutes walking distance to 5th Avenue & just a few minutes walk from Times Squares. Friendly staff, beds very comfortable. Will definitely return. Would recommend the Red Flame diner a few doors away for a good breakfast.
